gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Wizards 126, Pistons 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Wizards defeated the Pistons, 126-107. Kyle Kuzma led the Wizards with 32 points, 12 rebounds, and eight assists as Deni Avdija added 16 points, six rebounds, and five assists. Cade Cunningham (26 points, seven assists, five rebounds) and Ausar Thompson (16 points) combined for 42 points as Jalen Duren totaled 12 points, 14 rebounds, and five blocks on the night. The Wizards improve to 3-14 while the Pistons move to 2-15 on the year.
